description: Numbers n such that n divides binomial(2*n-4, n-2).
comments: Old name was: (n-2)-nd Catalan number is divisible by n.
maple: A019470:=n->`if`(binomial(2*n-4,n-2) mod n = 0,n,NULL): seq(A019470(n), n=1..70); # _Wesley Ivan Hurt_, Sep 13 2014
author: _Wouter Meeussen_
extensions: More terms from _Wesley Ivan Hurt_, Sep 13 2014
Name changed by _Wesley Ivan Hurt_, Sep 16 2014
